items.summary: Add the newly uploaded image "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-11 at 7.14.23 AM.png" to `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using a sanitized filename (no spaces/special characters), and update `frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx` to use this new asset as the main hero photo (replacing the current `src="/assets/generated/cute-hero-photo-v2.dim_1600x2000.jpg"`) while keeping the existing `imageError` fallback behavior intact.
